languages.text: {n}Губернатор, дрожа всем телом, склоняет голову{/n}. "Заверяю вас, Ваше Сиятельство, я никогда бы не могла даже помыслить... молю вас, дайте мне возможность доказать свою верность и объясниться..."

traits.locale_text: "Понимаю ваш гнев, Ваше Сиятельство, но, насколько я вижу, кучка грязных оборванцев не стали сколько-то серьезной угрозой для наследника прославленной династии фон Валанциус".

languages.text: {n}The governor, trembling all over, bows her head even lower{/n}. "I assure you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never... I beg you, give me the chance to prove my loyalty and explain myself..."
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор, дрожа всем телом, склоняет голову{/n}. "Заверяю вас, Ваше Сиятельство, я никогда бы не могла даже помыслить... молю вас, дайте мне возможность доказать свою верность и объясниться..."

traits.locale_text: "I understand your anger, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but as I see it, a mob of filthy traitors was hardly going to pose a serious threat to the heir of the illustrious von Valancius dynasty."

{n}The Governor, trembling all over, bows her head even deeper{/n}. "I assure you, Your Excellency, I would never even have contemplated such a heinous act... I beg you, give me the chance to prove my loyalty and explain myself..."
"I understand your anger, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but as I see it, a mob of filthy traitors was hardly going to pose a serious threat to the heir of the illustrious von Valancius dynasty."

{n}The governor, trembling all over, bows her head even lower{/n}. "I assure you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never... I beg you, give me the chance to prove my loyalty and explain myself..."

{n}The governor, trembling all over, bows her head even lower{/n}. "I assure you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never... I beg you, give me the chance to prove my loyalty and explain myself..."

languages.text: {n}总督浑身颤抖，头低得更低了。{/n}“我向您保证，大人，我绝不会……我求求您了，给我一个机会，让我证明我的忠诚，让我有机会向您解释……”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor, trembling all over, bows her head even lower{/n}. "I assure you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never... I beg you, give me the chance to prove my loyalty and explain myself..."

traits.locale_text: {n}总督浑身颤抖，头低得更低了。{/n}“我向您保证，大人，我绝不会……我求求您了，给我一个机会，让我证明我的忠诚，让我有机会向您解释……”

languages.text: {n}La gobernadora, temblando, agacha aún más la cabeza.{/n} «Le aseguro, mi{mf|lord|lady}, que nunca... Le ruego que me dé la ocasión de demostrar mi lealtad y darle una explicación...».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor, trembling all over, bows her head even lower{/n}. "I assure you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never... I beg you, give me the chance to prove my loyalty and explain myself..."

traits.locale_text: {n}La gobernadora, temblando, agacha aún más la cabeza.{/n} «Le aseguro, mi{mf|lord|lady}, que nunca... Le ruego que me dé la ocasión de demostrar mi lealtad y darle una explicación...».

languages.text: {n}総督はわなわなと震え、一段と深くお辞儀をする。{/n}「仰るとおりです陛下、二度と無いように…ご容赦を、どうか私の忠誠心を証明し、弁明する機会を何卒…」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor, trembling all over, bows her head even lower{/n}. "I assure you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never... I beg you, give me the chance to prove my loyalty and explain myself..."

traits.locale_text: {n}総督はわなわなと震え、一段と深くお辞儀をする。{/n}「仰るとおりです陛下、二度と無いように…ご容赦を、どうか私の忠誠心を証明し、弁明する機会を何卒…」

languages.text: {n}Die Gouverneurin zittert am ganzen Körper und senkt den Kopf noch tiefer{/n}. "Ich versichere Euch, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich würde niemals ... Ich flehe Euch an, gebt mir Gelegenheit, meine Loyalität zu beweisen und mich zu erklären ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor, trembling all over, bows her head even lower{/n}. "I assure you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never... I beg you, give me the chance to prove my loyalty and explain myself..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Gouverneurin zittert am ganzen Körper und senkt den Kopf noch tiefer{/n}. "Ich versichere Euch, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich würde niemals ... Ich flehe Euch an, gebt mir Gelegenheit, meine Loyalität zu beweisen und mich zu erklären ..."

languages.text: {n}La gouverneure, qui tremble de tout son corps, baisse la tête encore plus.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, je vous assure que je n'aurais jamais... Je vous en supplie, donnez-moi une chance de vous prouver ma loyauté et de m'expliquer... »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor, trembling all over, bows her head even lower{/n}. "I assure you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never... I beg you, give me the chance to prove my loyalty and explain myself..."

traits.locale_text: {n}La gouverneure, qui tremble de tout son corps, baisse la tête encore plus.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, je vous assure que je n'aurais jamais... Je vous en supplie, donnez-moi une chance de vous prouver ma loyauté et de m'expliquer... »

languages.text: {n}Vali tepeden tırnağa titreyerek başını daha da aşağı eğiyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, sizi temin ederim ki asla... Yalvarırım, bana sadakatimi kanıtlama ve maruzat sunma şansı tanıyın."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor, trembling all over, bows her head even lower{/n}. "I assure you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never... I beg you, give me the chance to prove my loyalty and explain myself..."
